intro: Psychotria matambuaii, commonly known as the Matambuai Psychotria, is a species of flowering plant native to the tropical regions of South America. It belongs to the Rubiaceae family, which includes a wide variety of shrubs and trees. The plant is characterized by its small, elliptical leaves and clusters of small, white to pale yellow flowers. It is often found in humid, shaded environments such as rainforests. Due to its limited distribution and habitat specificity, it is considered a rare and potentially endangered species.
